snippet: The cautious assessment by a senior government health official came on a day that he announced only one new case, as well as one new death.
abstract: South Korean health official Kwon Deok-cheol says Middle East respiratory syndrome outbreak seems to be trailing off after reporting only one new case of disease.
lead_paragraph: The cautious assessment by a senior government health official came on a day that he announced only one new case, as well as one new death.

headline.main: South Korean Official Says MERS Outbreak Seems to Be Easing
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; South Korea: MERS Cases Easing
